remarks: Commutativity rule for the midpoint.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ismid.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
ismid.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
ismid.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
ismid.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
ismid.1 $e |- ( ph -> G TarskiGDim>= 2 ) $.
midcl.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
midcl.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
midcom $p |- ( ph -> ( A ( midG ` G ) B ) = ( B ( midG ` G ) A ) ) $.
